content:
Hi there,

I'd like to publish wasi-keyvalue WIT package v0.2.0-draft as OCI artifact to GHCR per request from user https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-keyvalue/issues/50. Could WASI co-chairs help me in this case please? @Bailey Hayes @Pat Hickey

Tag and publish releases 路 Issue #50 路 WebAssembly/wasi-keyvalue
Please create releases and tag the repository with each version. The recent change from wasi:keyvalue@0.2.0-draft to wasi:keyvalue@0.2.0-draft2 means that all wit-deps update effectively pulls in t...
